TopicTitle: Mun Flby and returning on Shreds of Fuel (Video)

Articles.Content:
Hey guys this is a video of my mission last night I was proud of bringing Jeb home successfully.

I only had 200 units of fuel when passing the Mun, and the final burn to get back into a landing orbit was done with just 15 units of fuel left..

 

Anyway hope you like it, sorry for the bad piloting, and questionable other stuff but Ive only been playing a few days now.

The Rocket has 5 Stages,

1:  12 Hammer Boosters
2:  6 Hammer Boosters
3:  6 Thumper Boosters
4:  Reliant engine with a little more than half the liquid fuel
5:  Reliant engine with whats left, 3 Kerbals, Science Jr., Science Service Bay, powerpack service Bay (3 small reaction wheels, 12 batteries, 8 Solar Panels)

With better launch window and planning / Piloting I'm sure this rocket could do a lot more than Ive gotten it to do.  I have the level 2 Launchpad and Assembly Building, so I'm limited to 140 tons

 

Mun Flyby Video
Moving this mission report to Mission Reports.
